column.name: CODE_TABLE_TYPE
column.remarks: Code table type, please refer to T_DD_BUSI_CODE_TABLE_TYPE

column.name: PREDICATE
column.remarks: The predicate/filter condition for code table values

column.name: ID_FIELD
column.remarks: Code table "Id" value corresponding field name to retrieve data from data source

column.name: CODE_FIELD
column.remarks: Code table "Code" value corresponding field name to retrieve data from data source

column.name: DESC_FIELD
column.remarks: Code table "Description" value corresponding field name to retrieve data from data source

column.name: CONTEXT_ID
column.remarks: Code table corresponding context, please refer to T_DD_BUSI_CONTEXT

column.name: DATA_SOURCE
column.remarks: Code table data source, it could be table name, view name, or standard SQL query

column.name: IS_SMALL
column.remarks: Whether codes volume is small or big, value is N or Y, if Y, code table values are doing memory search

column.name: NEED_CACHE
column.remarks: Whether code table values need to be cached, value is N or Y

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: CONDITION_FIELDS
column.remarks: The condition fields used for filtering code table values, it should be field name exists in the data source query result, it is stored as JSON list format

column.name: NEED_MULTI_LANG
column.remarks: Whether need support multiple language, means the "Description" field of this code table

column.name: ID_DATA_TYPE
column.remarks: The data type of code table "Id" field, please refer to T_PUB_DATA_TYPE

column.name: CODE_DATA_TYPE
column.remarks: The data type of code table "Code" field, please refer to T_PUB_DATA_TYPE

column.name: DATA_TABLE_ID
column.remarks: If code table type is data table, then corresponding data table id should be here, please refer to t_DD_BUSI_DATA_TABLE

column.name: DOMAIN_MODEL_CLASS_ID
column.remarks: If code table type is domain model, then corresponding domain model class id should be here, please refer to T_DD_BUSI_JAVA_CLASS

column.name: CONTEXT_TYPE
column.remarks: Context type, please refer to T_DD_BUSI_CONTEXT_TYPE

column.name: REFERENCE_ID
column.remarks: The reference id of this context, which points to external concrete definition ID, e.g. product id

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: CONTEXT_PARAMS
column.remarks: The context key-value pairs of parameters, e.g. {"ProductCode":"P_AUTO", "ProductVersion":"1.0"}

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: CONTEXT_FIELDS
column.remarks: The context parameter fields, based on the field-value pairs system could locating the only context

column.name: CONTEXT_ID
column.remarks: The corresponding context, please refer to T_DD_BUSI_CONTEXT

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: DATA_TABLE_TYPE
column.remarks: Data table type, please refer to T_DD_BUSI_DATA_TABLE_TYPE

column.name: DATA_TABLE_ID
column.remarks: Data table id, please refer to T_DD_BUSI_DATA_TABLE

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: BUSINESS_OBJECT_ID
column.remarks: Business object id for this record,refer T_DD_BUSI_OBJECT

column.name: ALIAS
column.remarks: Alias of field, in JSON format

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

createTable.remarks: Data dictionary field binding definition, fields of specific business object

column.name: TAG_IDS
column.remarks: Tag ids in JSON format, refer T_DD_BUSI_TAG

column.name: IS_FIXED
column.remarks: Whether this field is fixed field

column.name: IS_MASKED
column.remarks: Whether field need be masked before output to UI view/other systems, security relevant purpose

column.name: IS_ENCRYPTED
column.remarks: Whether field need be encryped in database

column.name: PROPERTY_ID
column.remarks: If it is fixed field, the corresponding java property id should be here, refer T_DD_BUSI_JAVA_PROPERTY

column.name: CODE_TABLE_ID
column.remarks: Code table of this field values, refer T_DD_BUSI_CODE_TABLE

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: IS_FORMULA
column.remarks: Whether this field is calculated by formula.

column.name: SCOPE_IDS
column.remarks: Scope ids in JSON format, refer T_DD_BUSI_SCOPE

column.name: IS_TECHNICAL
column.remarks: Whether it is technical field, i.e. internal field of system

column.name: VALIDATION_RULE
column.remarks: Field value validation rule, in unicorn DSL format

column.name: MANDATORY_RULE
column.remarks: Field value mandatory rule, in unicorn DSL format

column.name: DEFAULT_VALUE_RULE
column.remarks: Field default value rule, in unicorn DSL format

column.name: MIN_LENGTH
column.remarks: Minimum length of field when it is string data type

column.name: MAX_LENGTH
column.remarks: Maximum length of field when it is string data type

column.name: MIN_VALUE
column.remarks: Minimum value of field when it is number, date data type

column.name: MAX_VALUE
column.remarks: Maximum value of field when it is number, date data type

column.name: VALUE_CONFLICT_ACTION
column.remarks: Action when value conflict occured during context change (e.g. product upgrade), refer T_DD_BUSI_VALUE_CONFLICT_ACT

column.name: PRECISION
column.remarks: Precision for double data type field

column.name: IS_UNIQUE
column.remarks: Whether this field is one of the unique field in the object instance collection

column.name: VALUE_COPY_RULE_GROUP
column.remarks: Value copy rule group in JSON format

column.name: JAVA_TYPE
column.remarks: Corresponding java type of this field type, refer T_DD_BUSI_JAVA_TYPE

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: DATA_PROVIDER_BEAN
column.remarks: Generate index field value map(field name, field value), should be spring bean name here

column.name: REBUILD_DATA_PROVIDER_BEAN
column.remarks: Provide data that to be rebuild, should be spring bean name here

column.name: REBUILD_INDEX_JOB_BEAN
column.remarks: Job of rebuild index, should be spring bean name here

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.name: FIELD_DEFINITION_PROVIDER_BEAN
column.remarks: Define field structure that did not maintained in db, should be spring bean name here

column.name: RECORD_USAGE
column.remarks: Record usage for definition data,ref T_PUB_RECORD_USAGE

column.remarks: Java class full name, which including package and class name

column.remarks: Whether this object is abstract for concrete object to inherit from it

column.name: BUSINESS_CODE

column.name: SUPER_OBJECT_ID
column.remarks: The super business object where this object inherit from, refer T_DD_BUSI_OBJECT

column.name: IS_AUTO_GENERATE_PARENT
column.remarks: Whether need auto generate the link to object instance while no link to object instance found

createTable.remarks: Integration in tx message,only archieved message stored here. To enable duplicate tx message check, the tx in message should not be archieved immediately atfer process.

column.name: NEED_RESPONSE
column.remarks: for external system may doesnot require response

column.name: AMOUNT
column.remarks: AMOUNT FOR EACH CURRENCY AND MONTH

column.name: EX_RATE_DIFF
column.remarks: the diff between current rate and original rate

column.name: EX_DIFF
column.remarks: the diff between current amount and original amount (base on the base currency)

createTable.remarks: Cash balance type of finance fee

column.name: ACCOUNT_TYPE
column.remarks: 1 account for collection, 2 account for payment

column.name: IS_IMPORT
column.remarks: 1 import, 0 manually, Indicate the date generated by importing function/ manually

createTable.remarks: The base finance data from other business module, including ARAP and other GL detail

column.name: ARAP_TYPE
column.remarks: Indicate the fee is ARAP or other no cash balance fee

column.name: CUR_PERIOD
column.remarks: Current installement of business fee in case of mulitple installments

column.name: PARTNER_CODE
column.remarks: Partner information of the busness transaction

column.name: DUE_DATE
column.remarks: Due data to be processed by settlement

column.name: IS_ESTIMATION
column.remarks: 0 No, 1 Yes, Indicate if it's estimation fee

column.name: NEED_POST
column.remarks: 0 No, 1 Yes, Indicate if it needs to be post to general ledger

column.name: POST_STATUS
column.remarks: 0 wait for posting, 1 posted, 2 extracted by GL mapping job

column.name: POST_DATE
column.remarks: The date when posted to GL

column.name: SPECIAL_SBUMT
column.remarks: 0 No, 1 Yes, Indicate if it's special submit in cutoff period for posting GL immediately

column.name: BIZ_REVERSAL_FLAG
column.remarks: Indicate if the business transaction is reversed

column.name: TRANS_TYPE
column.remarks: Settlement type, 1 colletion, 2 payment, 3 internal offset

createTable.remarks: Convert amount of finance settlement to new amount in other currency

column.name: SOURCE_TYPE
column.remarks: Indicate data source from which data model

column.name: SOURCE_ID
column.remarks: Primary key of specified data model

createTable.remarks: Indicate what's the amount to be converted
Detail fee / suspuse information related to corresponding settlement

column.name: OUTSTANDING_AMOUNT
column.remarks: Outstanding balance of related finance fee

column.name: MARK_OFF_AMOUNT
column.remarks: Mark off amount for the settlement

column.name: AMOUNT_DIFF
column.remarks: sttle difference = outstanding amount - mark off amount

column.name: NEED_POST
column.remarks: Indicate if need to be posted to GL

column.name: POST_STATUS
column.remarks: 0 wait for posting, 1 posted, 2 extracted by GL mapping job

column.name: GAIN_LOSS
column.remarks: calculate base on fee generation date and actural collection / payment

column.name: EXCHANGE_RATE
column.remarks: Exchange rate base on original currency and settlement currency

column.name: POST_DATE
column.remarks: The date when posted to GL

createTable.remarks: Summary information of currency for finance settlement

column.name: CONVERTED_AMOUNT
column.remarks: amount in original currency of corresponding fee

column.name: EXCHANGE_RATE
column.remarks: coverted amount / settlement amount = original currency > settlement currency

column.name: SYMBOL
column.remarks: Default symbol of currency, used for displaying

column.name: PEPORTING_CURRENCY
column.remarks: 0 No, 1 Yes, Indicate if it's reporting currency

column.name: GL_CURRENCY
column.remarks: 0 No, 1 Yes, Indicate if it's general ledger currency

column.name: NEED_POST
column.remarks: 0 no Need, 1 Need, Indicate if the fee can be post into general ledger

column.name: CASH_BALANCE
column.remarks: Indicate if the entry code is ARAP

createTable.remarks: Entry code mapping to General Ledger account

column.name: CASH_BALANCE_TYPE
column.remarks: Indicate if the GL is for cash balance entry

column.name: NEED_POST
column.remarks: Indicate if the account need to be posted

column.name: BATCH_TYPE
column.remarks: 1 sub ledger generation batch, 2 general ledger generation batch

column.name: SOURCE_TYPE
column.remarks: 1 SUB LEDGER ID, 2 GENERAL LEDGER ID

column.name: DOC_DATE
column.remarks: The document date is the date on which the original document was issued.

column.name: AMOUNT_DOC_CURRENCY
column.remarks: Line item amount in document currency.

column.name: ASSIGNMENT
column.remarks: Line item amount in the local currency of the company code.

column.name: VALUE_DATE
column.remarks: The value date is used in bank accounts and bank sub-accounts.

column.name: TEXT_DESC
column.remarks: Contains an explanatory text on the line item.

column.name: REFERENCE
column.remarks: The reference document number can contain the document number of the customer/vendor.

column.name: REF_TYPE
column.remarks: 1 GL BATCH LOG, 2 GL REALTIME LOG

column.name: DOC_DATE
column.remarks: The document date is the date on which the original document was issued.

column.name: GL_MAPPING_ENTRY_ID
column.remarks: GL account mapping entry instance id

column.name: SOA_NUMBER
column.remarks: The statement of account business number

column.name: TASK_RELEASER

column.name: TASK_CREATOR

column.name: TASK_WITHDRAW
column.remarks: The statement of account's withdrawed by user's id

column.remarks: The statement of account's released by user's name

column.name: TASK_WITHDRAW_NAME
column.remarks: The statement of account's withdrawed by user's name

column.name: RECEIVED_DATE
column.remarks: The statement of account's received date

column.remarks: The statement of account's entry user

changeSet.author: generated
changeSet.createView: CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW V_CONTRACT_SECTION_RELATION (SECTION_ID, CONTRACT_ID) AS select ROOT_ID section_id, cont_comp_id contract_id from ( select CONNECT_BY_ROOT CONT_COMP_ID ROOT_ID ,cont_comp_id ,parent_id from t_ri_contract_structure connect by nocycle cont_comp_id = prior parent_id ) where PARENT_ID IS NULL and root_id != cont_comp_id

changeSet.author: generated
changeSet.createView: CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW V_RI_BP_PARTNER (PARTNER_ID, BUSINESS_PARTNER_CATEGORY, BUSINESS_PARTNER_ID, TRADING_NAME, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, REGISTRATION_NAME, SHORT_NAME, ORGANIZATION_ID_TYPE, BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_CODE, DATE_OF_REGISTRATION, DUEDATE_OF_REGISTRATION, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, ID_TYPE, ID_NUMBER, DUEDATE_OF_ID_CERTIFICATION, DATE_OF_BIRTH, GENDER, COUNTRY, PARTNER_TYPE, INSERT_BY, UPDATE_BY, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, ROLE_SELECT, FULL_NAME, BUSINESS_PARTNER_NAME) AS select t."PARTNER_ID",t."BUSINESS_PARTNER_CATEGORY",t."BUSINESS_PARTNER_ID",t."TRADING_NAME",t."STATUS",t."CREATOR",t."CREATE_DATE",t."REGISTRATION_NAME",t."SHORT_NAME",t."ORGANIZATION_ID_TYPE",t."BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_CODE",t."DATE_OF_REGISTRATION",t."DUEDATE_OF_REGISTRATION",t."FIRST_NAME",t."LAST_NAME",t."ID_TYPE",t."ID_NUMBER",t."DUEDATE_OF_ID_CERTIFICATION",t."DATE_OF_BIRTH",t."GENDER",t."COUNTRY",t."PARTNER_TYPE",t."INSERT_BY",t."UPDATE_BY",t."INSERT_TIME",t."UPDATE_TIME",t."ROLE_SELECT",t."FULL_NAME" , (case when (t.business_partner_category= '1') then t.first_name||' '||t.last_name when (t.business_partner_category ='2' ) then t.trading_name end ) as business_partner_name FROM t_ri_bp_partner t

changeSet.author: generated
changeSet.createView: CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW V_RI_CURRENCY_EQUIVALENT (CURRENCY_CODE, CURRENCY_NAME, SYMBOL, PEPORTING_CURRENCY, GL_CURRENCY) AS select CURRENCY_CODE,CURRENCY_NAME,symbol,PEPORTING_CURRENCY,gl_currency from t_ri_currency union select 'USD Equivalent','USD Equivalent',null,null,null from dual
